Summary: big, green, red lights, green things looking out the window
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up to go to the bathroom. I heard mysterious noises. Then I looked out the window of my house and saw an egg shaped thing with weird looking symbols hovering my neighbors house. I was scared to death and I didn't know what to do so i sat there and watched the whole thing. My neighbors ran back inside there house and the weird looking object kept flying over different houses in the neighborhood. Then suddenly they dissapeared. This is the end of my story
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around October 31st 2006
